title: Imogen Thomas steps out with daughters Ariana, 6, and Siera, 3, at PAW Patrol event
text:
She's taken a back seat from the limelight of late to focus on parenting her daughters Ariana, six, and Siera, three.

And Imogen Thomas was putting a low-key appearance at the PAW Patrol Little Heroes Paw Awards in London on Sunday alongside her adorable children.

The reality star, 36, dressed down in a pale pink cord dress, worn belted at the waist.

Family fun: Imogen Thomas was putting a low-key appearance at the PAW Patrol Little Heroes Paw Awards in London on Sunday alongside her adorable children

Imogen wrapped up warm against the autumnal chill, teaming the look with black tights and matching boots.

She slung a stylish bag on one shoulder and styled her brunette bob in perfectly tousled waves.

Her sweet kids, who she shares with her ex Adam Horsley, were clad in matching dressed for their family outing.

Off-duty: The reality star, 36, dressed down in a pale pink cord dress, worn belted at the waist

Imogen also launched her own swimwear brand, Chasing Summer, in 2015 after she struggled to find bikinis and costumes to fit her curves.

In April, Imogen revealed she has closed her swimsuit business after 'losing motivation' for the venture in the wake of her split from her ex Adam.

She said: 'The past 11 months has been the most challenging time of my life. Becoming a single parent has changed me as a person.'

'Sunday funday': The former glamour model shared a sweet snapshot of herself with her daughters

'When my relationship broke down so did my aspirations for my business.'

'My motivation has not returned so after thinking hard this year I've decided it's time to say goodbye to Chasing Summer.'

'It's been a great few years but my priorities now lie with my two beautiful girls and I simply just do not have the time and energy that the business needs.'
description: Imogen Thomas was putting a low-key appearance at the PAW Patrol Little Heroes Paw Awards in London on Sunday alongside her adorable children.
